V(RTN}(^tqV5X0(xc-;j.text: Most of my code is stored in the Randomizer sprite. Otherwise, the code found in this block is repeated in every other block.

j?=7,+u!/3a#8B_Zn8`q.text: The way I made this project was by taking advantage of the "My Blocks" section where you can make a custom block and define it to safe time you would spend repeating the same thing over and over.
